definitions.text: cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person
a sandwich in which the filling is rolled up in a soft tortilla
the covering (usually paper or cellophane) in which something is wrapped
arrange or fold as a cover or protection
examples: wrap the baby before taking her out
roll your hair around your finger
Twine the thread around the spool
She wrapped her arms around the child

definitions.text: enclose or enfold completely with or as if with a covering
crash into so as to coil around
examples: The teenager wrapped his car around the fire hydrant
